title: Generalizable Geometric Image Caption Synthesis
summary: Multimodal large language models struggle with complex geometric problems due to a lack of high-quality image-text pair datasets for understanding geometric images. This paper introduces a method to bridge this gap, as most template-based data synthesis pipelines fail to generalize beyond predefined templates.
usefulness_reason: The paper addresses the "lack of high-quality image-text pair datasets" for geometric problems, which is relevant to the "Contextual dataset" aspect of the query. While not directly about spatio-temporal point processes or survey data, it deals with the creation and challenges of a specific type of dataset.
